about me text: I am a front-end developer based in Windeck, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies turn their ideas into reality. I'm looking forward to starting my career as a developer and finding a job as a web developer. If you think I would be a good fit for your projects, feel free to contact me!
personal-thing1: I have been learning software development for around four years. Thanks to a Web-Development Bootcamp at the Developer Akademie, a training as IT specialist for application development as well as self-study, I was able to acquire comprehensive knowledge in several programming languages and tools.
personal-thing2: I really enjoy learning new technologies. This allows me to constantly develop and stay up to date.
skills text: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.
portfolio text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action
description project1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
description project2: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
description project3:
A simple library that provides and catalogues pokémon
information based on the PokéAPI.
contact p1: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact p2: Need a frontend developer? Contact me!
